generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, on which cars are driving.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at intersections, some showing red signals.
